title: Fighting Game Loops and Sound Effects
description: 2500 SFX & Loops fight scene and close combat sound effects library.
longDescription:
Click HERE for SoundCloud Demo.

Click HERE for YouTube Demo 1.

Click HERE for YouTube Demo 2.


Fighting Game includes 2500 SFX & Loops – After months of sonic conflict, 14 voice acting warriors, and countless source recording and editing sessions, we happily present you with Fighting Game – fight scene and close combat sound effects library. Never surrender or retreat from a sound design battle again. Now YOU get to become the ultimate fighter and master sensei to almost any type of game audio project where combat sound effects, aggressive voice articulations, or cinematic sound design is needed. It’s the most supercharged, conflict-generating sound FX library available. Strike now and get this highly versatile and wide-ranging production suite, a genuine knockout with martial arts-styled sounds effects, male and female karate voice vocalizations & royalty-free production music loops. All game-ready.


Don’t get caught with your hands down to a client again or compromise on quality work – now it’s easier than ever to exchange blows to the face, create fight scenes with weight & emotion as well as inflict high levels of audio precision on your projects! With the Fighting Game, the battle has already been won. Kick off an action-packed adventure today! Hi-yah!



Fighting Game Includes:


    2500 sound effects & loops

    600+ designed game ready – combat sound effects

    900+ source/organic sound effects – build your own combat sounds or sweeten

    800+ fighting voice sound effects (from 14 voice actors)

    100+ royalty-free gameplay & menu music loops

    Over 2.5 GB of audio samples

    Over 73 minutes of game audio & SFX

    All in 44.1k/16bit



Fighting Game Sound Effects – A Complete Sound Effects and Production Sound Solution


Fighting Game includes a total of 2500 SFX & loops – Inspired by hit video games like Mortal Kombat, Fighting Game is an expertly crafted and imagined sound effects production suite stocked full with the emperor’s finest melee attacks, techniques, and all the natural, minimal to hybrid & highly processed combat game audio assets you can ask for. Fighting Game also features a large selection of gameplay music loops, fighting game voices – both female & male that will complete almost any project where warfare, fight skirmishes, or combat SFX are required. The library is organized into popular categories that make it easier to create outstanding fantasy & realistic confrontations, gaming experiences in the following folder structure: Abilities, Collectables, Combat Attacks, Combat Defense, Combat Foley, Combat Hits, Destruction, Voices Female, Voices Male, Weapons, Whooshes, Source, Music Loops.



Easy to Use Sound Effects for Film, Games, and Video


Armed & ready to use in fight scenes, animations, trailers, video games, mobile apps, motion graphics, film, and software & more. Fighting Game is loaded with 2500 sound effects & loops giving you the ability to create intricate fight sequences, immersive battles, onslaughts, warfare, epic trailers, MMO, RPG game classes, death, carnage, brutality, spell sets, magic, items, martial arts, character skill sounds, collects, awards, boosts, interactive user interfaces, power-ups, buffs, and console styled magic & combat game sound and feels.



Game-Ready or Construct Your Own Combat Sound Effects


The beauty of Fighting Game is that it includes the three most important sound effects types that make up a fighting game audio soundtrack. Designed, Source & Voice, the SFX categories, can be used together to truly give you maximum control over how you want your fights to feel and sound. Inside the Designed folder you get 600+ designed & game-ready combat sounds, accompanied by 800+ fighting voices (in both male & female). Your character will come alive with our voice selection. It includes 9 male voice actor sets as well as 5 female voice actor sets. Each voice set includes grunts, roars, death, pain, swing vocalizations & more.


Plus the sound library includes 900+ source/organic hits, movements, textures, layers, foley, field recordings that help you sweeten pre-existing SFX or create your very own custom combat game sound effects! With this kind of potent mixture of both designed SFX, voice actors sounds & source/organic sound effects – we at Epic Stock Media are convinced you will be fully locked & loaded to smoke the competition. Face any fight-related audio project with the right tools & watch as you create your best work and save a lot of time.


All of the sound effects files are designed to make your life easier, production workflow faster, and delivered in 44.1k/16bit WAV Audio File Format to maintain top-notch audio fidelity. Victory is yours when you download Fighting Game. Available now!
technicalDetails:
• 600+ designed game ready – combat sound effects
  • 900+ source/organic sound effects – build your own combat sounds or sweeten
  • 800+ voice sound effects (from 14 voice actors)
  • 100+ gameplay & menu music loops
  • Over 1.4 GB of audio samples
  • Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability
  • 1 Supercharged & powerfully designed combat sound effects library & game audio production suite
  • 87 designed abilities, power-ups, magic spells, buffs, specials
  • 48 designed collectibles, pickups, items, health & more
  • 69 designed combat attacks, strikes, impacts, big hits
  • 55 designed defense blocks, stun, interrupt, dodge, counter attack, evade & more
  • 32 designed combat foley essentials, grab, fall, throw, whoosh, fist
  • 127 designed combat hits, kicks, punches, gore, from big punchy bloody ones to stock simple punches
  • 43 designed destruction hits, breaks – concrete crash, drywall, metal, wood, glass shatter & much more
  • 333 designed female combat voices, emotes, vocalizations (from 5 female voice actors)
  • 503 designed male combat voices, emotes, vocalizations (from 9 male voice actors)
  • 59 designed weapons SFX, handheld sword, mace, staff, pistol, laser, shield
  • 111 music loops for fighting gameplay & menu (all BPM & key tagged)
  • 98 designed whooshes, swooshes, sweeps, throw, light, deep, heavy, glassy, twirls, real, whip & much more


Number of Audio Waves: 2506

Number of Audio Cues: 2506

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, some

Minutes of audio provided: 73 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
